elements.formButtonPrimary: bg-cyan-400 hover:bg-purple-500 text-white font-bold py-3 px-6 rounded-lg w-full transition-all duration-200 transform hover:scale-105
elements.formFieldInput: w-full px-4 py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-cyan-400 focus:border-transparent text-gray-900 placeholder-gray-500 bg-white
elements.formButtonSecondary: bg-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-300 text-gray-800 font-bold py-3 px-6 rounded-lg w-full transition-all duration-200 border border-gray-300
elements.socialButtonsBlockButton: bg-white hover:bg-gray-50 text-gray-800 font-bold py-3 px-6 rounded-lg w-full transition-all duration-200 border border-gray-300
elements.alert: bg-red-50 border border-red-200 text-red-800 rounded-lg p-4
elements.avatarBox: w-12 h-12 rounded-full bg-cyan-400 flex items-center justify-center
elements.userButtonPopoverActionButton: text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100 px-4 py-2 rounded-lg transition-colors
elements.modalContent: bg-white rounded-lg shadow-xl max-w-md w-full mx-4
